Text: Man im REALLY want this game so plzz seed like you almost die xD joking but plzz seed
do i open this with deamon tools or power iso ?
it says abort retry ignore while install goes

Okay, so I got the stupid CRC error while trying to install this game after mounting the .nrg filw with Daemon Tools. I tried for a work-around and finally was able to run the game. 

Here's how:

When you get than error you will have 3 options to click on: Cancel, Ignore, Retry. Simply click  the IGNORE option to ignore these errors while installing and the entire installation will complete. Then just hit the desktop shortcut and the game will start!

When I try to start up the game it throws me the "Insert correct disc" (in caps) message.
Win 7 Ultimate 32-bit.
this works only till the 12th area.....
i burned it to a CD but still just get the .nrg file, no change?

Thanks for upload :D 
Mounted the .nrg file with POWER ISO and setup started.
Got 4-5 CRC errors But Pressing Ignore worked and game installed :D
Kept the .nrg mounted by Power iso and Played 4 areas and it is working fine (^.^)
